lemma perron_frobenius_spectral_type_based: assumes "non_neg_mat (A :: real ^ 'n ^ 'n)" and "\<forall> x. poly (charpoly A) x = 0 \<longrightarrow> x \<le> 1" and "\<forall> x :: complex. norm x = 1 \<longrightarrow> order x (map_poly of_real (charpoly A)) \<le> d" shows "\<exists>c1 c2. \<forall>k a. a \<in> elements_mat_h (matpow A k) \<longrightarrow> abs a \<le> (c1 + c2 * real k ^ (d - 1))"
